title: XC-Wildcard port on virtual not supported in XC
message: XC-Multiport LBs are not supported yet

title: XC-Wildcard VIP not supported
message: XC-Wildcard VIPs not supported

title: AppFlow reference detected
message: AppFlow, similar to sflow, has been detected on this app (add more details about appflow/sflow)

title: XC-FTP not supported?
message: so, look for tcp ports 21/22

title: Content Policy detected
message: NS Content Policies inspect and manipulate traffic based on application layer options like headers/URL.  Convert to F5 iRule/Traffic Policies

title: XC-Static NAT not supported
message: XC can nat, but uses a range of sources -- refine the regex

title: XC-snat pool object detected
message: NATs are supported, but not statics

title: XC-Client Certificate Authentication
message: XC client certificate authentication requires different configuration approach

title: TMOS-Weak SSL Protocols Detected
message: SSL v2/v3 and TLS 1.0/1.1 are deprecated. Consider upgrading to TLS 1.2+

title: XC-Advanced LB Methods Not Supported
message: XC doesn't support all advanced LB methods - may need custom logic

title: XC reserved ports
message:
Http failure response: 400 Bad Request 
For tcp_loadbalancer dude/test configuration for child object advertise_policy ves-io-tcp-loadbalancer-test-df9979789 is wrong - 8443 is a reserved port, list of reserved ports 28000 - 32767 (kubernetes),28000 - 32767 (volterra),2379,9090,9999,18091,22222,23790,23791,1067,2380,8005,18092,9153,10250,10252,10259,500,8007,8443,10251,18095,23801,5355,8507,9007,68,323,23802,8444,8505,10249,10257,22,4500,8087,18093,53,6443,10256

title: XC UDP Unsupported
message: XC does not currently support UDP *** does ns support udp? ***

title: Default Redirect iRule Detected
message: The default http->https redirect irule has been detected.

title: vs references backupVServer
message: In NS points to a backup VS if current pool resources are down, F5 priority group activation is the equivilant

title: XC-Custom Persistence Rules
message: XC may require different approach for complex persistence scenarios

title: Rate Limiting Configuration
message: NS surge protection/rate limiting requires F5 DoS protection profile configuration

title: NGINX-Advanced Monitor Features
message: NGINX Plus may not support all NetScaler monitor features - review carefully

title: SSL Certificate Binding Detected
message: SSL certificate found - verify certificate chain and expiration dates in F5

title: Load Balancing Method Translation
message: NS method maps to F5 equivalent: ROUNDROBIN→round-robin, LEASTCONNECTION→least-connections-member

title: Session Persistence Detected
message: NS persistence type detected - verify F5 equivalent: SOURCEIP→source-addr, COOKIEINSERT→cookie

title: Health Monitor Configuration
message: Custom health monitors detected - review F5 monitor configuration options

title: Compression Policy Detected
message: NS compression policies map to F5 HTTP compression profiles

title: Caching Configuration Found
message: NS caching features map to F5 web acceleration/caching policies

title: DDoS Protection Features
message: NS DDoS settings need to be configured in F5 DoS protection profiles

title: GSLB Configuration Complexity
message: GSLB configurations require careful F5 DNS/GTM planning and testing

title: Content Switching Policies
message: NS content switching rules map to F5 Local Traffic Policies or iRules

title: TCP Profile Configuration
message: NS TCP profile settings map to F5 TCP profile configurations

title: Authentication Policy Detected
message: NS authentication policies map to F5 Access Policy Manager (APM) configurations

title: Rewrite Policy Configuration
message: NS rewrite policies map to F5 iRules or Local Traffic Policies for header/URL manipulation

title: Responder Policy Found
message: NS responder policies map to F5 iRules or Local Traffic Policies for custom responses

title: HTTP Profile Configuration
message: NS HTTP profile settings map to F5 HTTP profile configurations

title: XC-Advanced SSL Features
message: XC may not support all advanced SSL features - verify SSL policy compatibility

title: Service Group Configuration
message: NS service groups map to F5 pool configurations with member definitions

title: Server Definition Found
message: NS server objects map to F5 node definitions in pool configurations

title: TMOS-Legacy SSL Ciphers
message: Legacy SSL cipher suites detected - consider modern cipher suite configuration

title: DNS Configuration Found
message: NS DNS settings may require F5 DNS/GTM configuration for advanced features

title: XC-Custom Scripts Not Supported
message: XC doesn't support custom scripts - consider alternative implementation approaches

title: Virtual Server State Configuration
message: NS virtual server state settings map to F5 virtual server enabled/disabled state

title: Connection Limit Detection
message: NS connection limits map to F5 virtual server connection limit settings

title: Timeout Configuration Found
message: NS timeout settings map to F5 profile timeout configurations (TCP, HTTP, etc.)

title: VLAN Configuration Detected
message: NS VLAN settings may require F5 network configuration adjustments

title: NGINX-Complex Load Balancing
message: Complex NS load balancing configurations may require NGINX Plus advanced features

title: Traffic Domain Configuration
message: NS traffic domains map to F5 route domain or partition configurations

title: Redirect Policy Found
message: NS redirect policies map to F5 iRules or HTTP redirect profiles

title: Protocol Configuration Best Practice
message: Consider protocol-specific optimizations in F5 profiles (TCP, HTTP, SSL)

title: Load Balancing Optimization
message: Review F5 load balancing methods for optimal performance based on application requirements

title: Health Monitoring Best Practice
message: Implement comprehensive health monitoring in F5 for optimal traffic management

title: Security Policy Review
message: Review security policies and consider F5 Application Security Manager (ASM) integration

title: Performance Optimization
message: Consider F5 performance optimization features for improved application delivery

title: Configuration Validation
message: Validate all converted configurations thoroughly in F5 environment before production deployment
